entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023
